shellshocker

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.EnemySprite
      • shellshocker.Boss
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location

    public class Boss
extends EnemySprite
    Creates a boss enemy that guards the final level of the ShellShocker game. The boss enemy differs from other enemies because it has more health, weapons, and cannot be avoidable in order to complete the mission goal in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss(int t,
    int x,
    int y,
    int xSpd,
    int ySpd,
    int h)
        Constructor for creating the Boss object.
        Parameters:
        t - The type of enemy.
        x - The x-coordinate of the location of the enemy.
        y - The y-coordinate of the location of the enemy.
        xSpd - The horizontal vector speed of the enemy.
        ySpd - The vertical vector speed of the enemy.
        h - The health value of the enemy.

        public void track(int x,
         int y)
        Adjusts the boss speed based on the location given in the passed parameters.
        Parameters:
